# ChangeLog

## 6.2.0
* Added: send x-ebay-c-trackable-id request header to pathfinder service calls, 
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3998

## 6.1.0
* Added: Enable enduserctx request header for pathfinder service calls, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3425

## 6.0.4
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument

## v6.0.3
* Added urn for service-discovery 

## v6.0.0
* Removed unused APIs `isCALDisabled` & `isCALEnabled`
* Added Logging of Pathfinder Payload on `debug` `true`
* Removed Pathfinder Flag Check as Pathfinder is Enabled 100%

## v5.0.0
* Added UFES support for sending tracking headers `X-EBAY-C-TRACKING` to Pathfinder as Headers
* API Changed to take new parameter `request`

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v1.0.7
* Enabled pathfinder by default (added PathfinderEnabled_global)
* Modified API (isCALDisabled -> isCALEnabled) that is not yet used
* Upgraded to service-client-ebay@2.x (trooba based)

## v1.0.6
* Changed SchemaId

## v1.0.5

## v1.0.4
* Changed production end point URL to full VIP instead of short VIP

## v1.0.3
* Updated config key to use app name e.g. `PathfinderEnabled_someapp`

## v1.0.2
* Updated QA endpoint

## v1.0.1
* Changed `PathfinderEnabled` to `false`
* Added `force-retry`

## v1.0.0
* Initial Version
